data.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
data.meta_description: Posts about Raiders of the Lost Ark written by jonathondsvendsen
data.text:

When it came time to direct the third film in the Indiana Jones franchise, the hard part was finding a great artifact for the intrepid archeologist to seek. Despite the flack he gets for Temple of Doom and Kingdom of … Continue reading →

The expanded universe materials introduced their share of “Indy” girls to the Indiana Jones franchise. Many of these beguiling damsels captured the fancy of both the esteemed archeologist and his fans, including Deirdre Campbell and Alecia Dunstin in the novels, … Continue reading →

How does someone who has done blog anthologies celebrating the work of George Lucas and Steven Spielberg out do himself? By embarking on another adventure, this time, looking at the iconic collaboration…
